text: Kare ga isseini kare-ra o shoshu sa reru hi,(-nushi wa) `Jin no katagata yo, anata gata wa hitobito no oku o madowa seta nodearu.'(To ose rareyou. ) Hitobito no naka, kare-ra (Jin) no tomo ga ite iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa tagaini riyo shi aimashitaga, anata ga watashi-tachi ni sadame rareta kigen ga torai shimashita.' Kare wa ose rareyou. `Goka ga anata gata no sumaidearu.' Arra no o konomi ni naru kagiri, eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou. Hontoni anata no omo wa eimei ni shite zenchi de ara reru
